title: Gulf Islands National Seashore: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours       Gulf Islands National Seashore offers a variety of ranger-led programs.  Visit historic brick and iron forts, take a barrier island walk or hike through salt marsh habitats, or snorkel and kayak in the emerald green waters.  Programs are offered throughout the year with morning and afternoon times available. Please see our current schedule below or check our Schedule of Events. Ranger-led tours are a great addition to any vacation!  Special tours are available for large groups or groups needing accessibility attention. For Florida programs please call 850-934-2600 or for Mississippi  programs please call 228-230-4100 for more information or use the website Contact Us option.
